content: The drivers of the full year performance were similar to those in the fourth quarter. The drivers of the full year performance were similar to those in the fourth quarter. The drivers of the full year performance were similar to those in the fourth quarter. We do not give quarterly guidance, but given the destocking in packaging, the operating challenges in Muscle Shoals and the timing of inflationary impacts on our business, we do expect adjusted EBITDA in the first quarter of 2023 to be weaker than the same period last year and free cash flow to be negative in the quarter. Your line is now open. Good morning, Jean-Marc and Peter. Your line is now open. Good morning, Jean-Marc and Peter. Your line is now open. Good morning, Jean-Marc and Peter. Your line is now open.
